elements.text: Question: is this answer trolling, actually helpful, or both at the same time?

text: I mean, the only other answer, based on python as requested, didn't get a vote in 5 five days, so...

text: I don't think it's trolling, like someone could get upset about it if they are like against using FFI in python or something (inwhich case just uninstall the dang thing).

elements.text: I don't think it's trolling, like someone could get upset about it if they are like against using FFI in python or something (inwhich case just uninstall the dang thing).

text: Python is using c++ and fortran all the time, so why not julia?

elements.text: Python is using c++ and fortran all the time, so why not julia?

text: This is ironic, since julia would be the second language in the new two-language problem.
